content: **christmas pudding ornament crochet pattern** create your own adorable christmas pudding decoration with this easy crochet pattern perfect for amigurumi beginners and seasoned crafters alike this charming project features a cute pudding with a sweet little face topped with a cheerful cherry designed as a hanging ornament it s an ideal addition to your festive decor or a thoughtful handmade gift the pattern is simple to follow and comes as an instant pdf download so you can get started right away on your holiday crafting the crochet pattern is 5 pages long and written in english and us crochet terms the pattern contains plenty of progress photos to guide you along and is an easy skill level project **supplies** 3mm crochet hook dk weight yarn scissors sewing needle 10mm safety eyes toy stuffing **yarn** weight dk / light worsted/ #3 brand stylecraft squeeze me dk a red b green c white d brown e almond total 36 yards **gauge** 3mm hook 2″ x 2″ swatch = 10 row of 10 single_crochet **finished size** height 7cm x diameter 20cm **abbreviations us terms ** blo back loop only chain chain double_crochet double_crochet flo front loop only half_double_crochet half_double_crochet magic_ring magic_ring r round / row single_crochet single_crochet 2sc 2 single_crochet in 1 space increase decrease single_crochet 2 together decrease slip_stitch slip_stitch st/sts stitch/stitches **skill level** easy **notes** a free online basic version of this crochet pattern is available at https //hookfully com/crochet-christmas-pudding-ornament-free-pattern/
